reviewText: great movies was riveted to my seat the entire family enjoyed
Blu-ray played on my PS4 as blu-rays are not region specific.
Very good movies and they were exactly what I wanted!

I ordered this for my daughter for Christmas.  When I put in the code to redeem my free digital copy I learned that the code was "not for my region."  I wasn't sure why.  Upon looking more closely at the packaging I realized the DVD was from the UK/Ireland region.  I panicked because DVD's are zoned.  I thought I wouldn't be able to play it.  This Blu Ray however let me play in my player with no issues. I'm bummed I can't redeem my free digital copy, that's why I buy Blu Ray instead of DVD, for the free digital copies, however, this does play.  Would rather have a DVD from my region.
